info.title: Azure SQL Database Backup
info.description: Provides read functionality for Azure SQL Database Backups

get.description: Gets a list of database restore points.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database to get available restore points.

GET https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-6730/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-9007/databases/3481/restorePoints?api-version=2014-04-01 HTTP/1.1

restorePointType.description: The restore point type of the database restore point.

restorePointCreationDate.description: Restore point creation time (ISO8601 format). Populated when restorePointType = CONTINUOUS. Null otherwise.

earliestRestoreDate.description: Earliest restore time (ISO8601 format). Populated when restorePointType = DISCRETE. Null otherwise.

RestorePointProperties.description: Represents the properties of a database restore point.

properties.description: The properties of the restore point.

value.description: The list of database restore points.

RestorePointListResult.description: The response to a list database restore points request.

serviceLevelObjective.description: The service level objective name of the database

elasticPoolName.description: The elastic pool name of the database

lastAvailableBackupDate.description: The last available backup date of the database (ISO8601 format)

RecoverableDatabaseProperties.description: The properties of a recoverable database

properties.description: The properties of a recoverable database

RecoverableDatabaseListResult.description: The response to a list recoverable databases request

maxSizeBytes.description: The max size in bytes of the database

serviceLevelObjective.description: The service level objective name of the database

elasticPoolName.description: The elastic pool name of the database

creationDate.description: The creation date of the database (ISO8601 format)

deletionDate.description: The deletion date of the database (ISO8601 format)

earliestRestoreDate.description: The earliest restore date of the database (ISO8601 format)

RestorableDroppedDatabaseProperties.description: The properties of a restorable dropped database

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

properties.description: The properties of a restorable dropped database

value.description: A list of restorable dropped databases

RestorableDroppedDatabaseListResult.description: The response to a list restorable dropped databases request

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

DatabaseExpandParameter.name: $expand
DatabaseExpandParameter.description: A comma separated list of child objects to expand in the response. Possible properties: serviceTierAdvisors, transparentDataEncryption.
